item.description:
Don't miss the chance of a lifetime !! Experience the art of Kathak, a classical Indian dance form.

The iconic Pandit Birju Maharaj, who revived Kathak in the 21st century, is coming to Cambridge, Massachusetts.

Pandit Birju Maharaj will perform magnificent traditional Kathak dances from Ancient to Modern, from Temples to Royal Courts, through Hindu and Muslim cultures. He will be accompanied by 3 dancers with live musical accompaniment of sitar and tabla. Spend a romantic evening with one of India's most beloved balladeers as he performs Thumri or Bhajans by unique rendering through gestures and mime.

On behalf of Association For India's Development, MIT & Boston Chapters, we are excited to present Pandit Birju Maharaj - Concert of the Legend.

DATE: Sunday, October 7, 2012
LOCATION: MIT, Kresge Auditorium, [Parking Details] [Directions]
Opposite 77 Massachusetts Avenue, Cambridge, MA
Doors open at 6pm; Concert starts at 7pm. First come, first serve seating.
Additional $5 if purchasing tickets on date of event at the gate.
Any questions: events @ aidboston.org | 857-600-2431

http://www.aidboston.org/events/BirjuMaharaj2012/index.html

facebook: https://www.facebook.com/pages/AID-Events-Boston/157174747753340
item.name: Pandit Birju Maharaj: Concert of the Legend
